name: Fastlane Consulting
goal: A public affairs and communication consultancy providing advisory services to companies, groups of companies, trade associations and NGOs on EU advocacy campaigns, reputation management and sustainability strategies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
Circular economy package
EU Investment Plan
EU Climate and Sustainability policies
EU Bioeconomy Strategy
